::: {data-aos="fade-up"}
Welcome! I'm a research data scientist leading evaluation, assessment, and quality improvement in health and social sciences. I currently work on evaluating and improving medical school curricula and education research in the [School of Medicine and Public Health](https://www.med.wisc.edu) at UW Madison.

I'm available for consulting. I help organizations transform data into meaningful insights and decisions. Whether you're evaluating programs, developing and validating measurement instruments, or building systems for ongoing quality improvement, I can help you collect, manage, and analyze complex datasets---from surveys and interviews to electronic health records and criminal case data.

Here's how I work: I write analytic plans that hold up. I build collection methods that scale. I develop measures that are valid and reliable. I engineer robust pipelines that resist breaking. I deliver reports and dashboards that inform action.

Beyond delivering technical solutions, I build capacity for sustained quality improvement. I help teams develop their skills in programming and writing, so you can maintain and extend the work we do together. If you want to strengthen your data infrastructure, I'd love to work with you!

[Learn more about my consulting work! â†’](consulting.html)
